revised_title: Compression of Anisotropic Fiber Monofilaments: Experimental and Theoretical Study
tldr: This study investigates the compression of anisotropic fiber monofilaments, focusing on the change in diameter and contact width under varying loads. The research includes theoretical calculations and experimental results for polyethylene terephthalate and nylon monofilaments. The findings provide a complete specification of the elastic properties of these materials.
